ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 22
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya all, This is Elizabeth. I am on Quellious, Errollisi Marr and The Rathe. I am a low level on all. I mostly play Genevive on The Rathe and Silarus on
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya all,
This is Elizabeth. I am on Quellious, Errollisi Marr
and The Rathe. I am a low level on all. I mostly play
Genevive on The Rathe and Silarus on Errollisi Marr.
Can we move the meeting back to the 1st. I am going
out of town on the 6th and that would really suck for
me. I want to be in with all of you. So Can we change
it to Aug 1st? Please let me know.

Elizabeth

--- Dawn Lamb <dawn@...> wrote:
> From: "Dawn Lamb" <dawn@...>
>
> That is cool! I'll be there. Trying to decide what
> type of character I want
> to make there now :)
>
> Zoya, Rodcet Nife
> ----------
> >From: Suzanne Johnson <katannah@...>
> >To: EQ_women@onelist.com
> >Subject: Re: [EQ_women] Digest Number 22
> >Date: Sat, Jul 10, 1999, 11:36 AM
> >
>
> >From: Suzanne Johnson <katannah@...>
> >
> >Okay, how about this? August 6th, on the Quellios
> server, in the Freeport Arena?
> >Starting time, say 7 PM PST (that's 10 PM for you
> East coasties, if that's too
> >late for a Friday night, just let me know and we
> can negotiate. <grins>)? I'll
> >make a character and let you know what your
> "hostess's" name is...... =P
> >
> >Sara, Povar
> >
> >Obrien wrote:
> >
> >> From: "Obrien" <obrien@...>
> >>
> >> Hi All..
> >>
> >> I also like the idea of us all grouping up and
> hunting together.. where and
> >> when.. hope i can make it..
> >>
> >> See u in their world
> >>
> >> Catt/Reba
> >> E'ci
> >>

____________________________________________________________________________
> >> ___
> >> >
> >> > Message: 1
> >> > Date: Wed, 07 Jul 1999 09:03:09 -0400
> >> > From: Lora Roa <loraroa@...>
> >> > Subject: Hello!
> >> >
> >> > New subscription to the list here.
> >> >
> >> > I don't know what's usual for an introduction,
> but here goes:
> >> >
> >> > I'm an (alost) middle-aged computer
> person/working mom. I've been RPGing
> >> > since I was 11 years old (started in pre D&D
> era), and since D&D, AD&D,
> >> > Traveller, ICE, GURPS etc ... all came out when
> I was in high school to
> >> > college I pen & paper RPed/GMed/DMed a lot back
> then. I ran an all-female
> >> > group around 20 years ago in my college
> hometown which at one time
> >> included
> >> > my then 80-90-year-old (passed away now)
> conservative German immigrant
> >> > grandmother. She would visit and I really got
> to ask "Canasta or D&D?".
> >> :)
> >> > I also ran mixed and male-only (except for me)
> groups.
> >> >
> >> > Due to time contraints of job and children I
> haven't done pencil & paper
> >> > games for at well over a decade, but do play
> on-line! I've played other
> >> > on-line RPGs (but not UO for more than 1 week)
> for years, and am now
> >> > playing in EQ. Since I never have enough time
> ... my characters "never
> >> > amount to much". But I have fun! My almost
> teen daughter has played
> >> > on-line with me in two other RPGs (supervised),
> and helps with the EQ
> >> > character creation. If I can ever get ADSL
> here, we'll be a mother &
> >> > daughter team on-line. :) Sometimes I think we
> have as much fun coming up
> >> > with the ideas for a character as actually
> playing them.
> >> >
> >> > I like to experiment with character ideas and
> right now have no "main"
> >> > character. So far I like Enchanter & Bard.
> Though my Necromancer is
> >> > surprisingly fun to play. I sort of enjoy the
> amazement (do they even
> >> > belive me?) when I claim that it REALLY is a
> female player behind this
> >> > female character. I know thay don't belive me
> when I tell many of the
> >> > college age males that I've been
> playing/running RPGs longer than they've
> >> > been alive (and I'm female). ;) I mainly play
> on Erollisi Marr, but
> >> > occasionally play on the Test Server.
> >> >
> >> > - Lora
> >> >
> >> > P.S.
> >> > My husband tolerates us well (he's not an
> RPGer), and I'm waiting to see
> >> if
> >> > my son got "the gene".
> >> >
> >> > At the moment:
> >> > Starling, Lisonja, Ainsley, Meute, Mitte,
> Shaelie & Leontine
> >> > on Erollisi Marr
> >> >
> >> >
> >> >
> >> >
> >> >
> >>
>
____________________________________________________________________________
>
=== message truncated ===
